title: GRIP: Combat Racing + 6 DLCs
body:
GRIP: Combat Racing + 6 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Racing, Vehicular combat, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Caged Element, Wired Productions
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI10
Original Size: 4.9 GB
Repack Size: 2.5 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Good Old Downloads (NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: WorldSrc (NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread LATER

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on GRIP.Combat.Racing-CODEX ISO release: codex-grip.combat.racing.iso (5,293,047,808 bytes)
  • Six DLCs included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 4.9 to 2.5 GB)
  • Installation takes 2-6 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 9 GB
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • To force the game language, open properties for game desktop icon and add the parameter for the Grip.exe: -culture=00, replace “00” with one of the following: EN_GB, DE_DE, ES_ES, IT_IT, FR_FR, RU_RU, JA_JP, PL_PL, KO_KR, ZH_CN

Game Description

GRIP is a high octane, hardcore combat racer, packing ferocious speed and armed to the teeth with heavy weapons.

Harnessing gravity defying physics alongside a bristling arsenal of outlandish weapons, GRIP delivers the fastest, most competitive racing experience ever. Scale walls, ceilings and anything else you can get your tyres on to… as you master tantalising tracks, tricks and perform mind-blowing stunts to race your way across the cosmos.

Included DLCs

  • Cygon Customisation Pack
  • Nyvoss Customisation Pack
  • Pariah Customisation Pack
  • Terra Customisation Pack
  • Vintek Customisation Pack
  • Early Access Rewards
